summary: Re-texture of ALL \"Monk\" Robes in game, each using a unique
descriptionHtml:
This is part of my N-R HD Clothes Mod.
However, I uploaded it as a separate mod because of the general interest.

The resolution does NOT change, it\'s still 1k.

It\'s part of my theory that file resolution matters to a certain point. 
Instead of blowing up the texture to 4k, sharpening it, filtering it heavily, uploading it, and claiming to be \"High Resolution\".

The point is to work with the amount allotted and bring out the \"flavor\".


The complete project is here:
http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5603
author: Kobayashi345
